sentences.en: But the sound is deeply unattractive and damaging for the vocal chords.
sentences.cn: 但这种声音非常缺乏吸引力,而且有损于声带.

sentences.en: Carolyn : Jane, honey are you trying to look unattractive?
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳: 简, 亲爱的,你是不是想招人讨厌?

sentences.en: Does his voice always havethat unattractive nasal tone?
sentences.cn: 他说话总有这种不讨人喜欢的鼻音么?

sentences.en: He was handsome and unattractive , a swashbuckling , beefy, conceited man who was putting on fat.
sentences.cn: 他样子挺英俊,可就是不讨人喜欢;长得结实粗壮,身子已经开始发胖,这个人夜郎自大, 欺软怕硬.

sentences.en: I'm 27, have a nice flat, a good job and I'm not unattractive.
sentences.cn: 本人27岁，有一所不错的公寓，一份像样的工作，长得也不难看。

sentences.en: In fact, so deep that the color is dull and unattractive.
sentences.cn: 事实上深到发暗就不吸引人了.

sentences.en: It's an unattractive building, even ugly / ugly even.
sentences.cn: 这座建物很不起眼, 甚至可以说很难看.

sentences.en: It'shows an unattractive indifference to your employer and to your job.
sentences.cn: 它表明你对雇主和你的工作的态度冷漠,不感兴趣.

sentences.en: Such fences were fairly functional, but were unattractive and wasteful of land.
sentences.cn: 这种篱笆虽然实用, 却不美观,并且占地多.

sentences.en: The general was an unattractive man to all but his most ardent admirers.
sentences.cn: 除了他那些铁杆崇拜者外，这位将军对于其他人并无吸引力。

sentences.en: The house's aspect was dark and unattractive.
sentences.cn: 那幢房子的外观又黑又难看.

sentences.en: The merchandiser and the fruit grower have blamed each other for bruised unattractive fruit.
sentences.cn: 由于果实损伤而外观不美,常常引起经销人与水果生产者互相责怪.

sentences.en: The newspaper stories played down the actor's unattractive past.
sentences.cn: 报纸上讲的事情没注意到这演员平平庸庸的过去.

sentences.en: Wales unattractive and Scotland unprofitable, so the legions rarely went there.
sentences.cn: 威尔士缺乏吸引力,苏格兰又无利可图, 因此罗马军团很少进驻这两个地区.

words.tran_cn: 不吸引人注意的；没有魅力的；不美丽的

trans.tran_cn: 不吸引人的，丑陋的，无吸引力的，枯燥的
trans.tran_en: not attractive, pretty, or pleasant to look at
